Greetings to Chadian President
    Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today sent a message of greetings to Idris Deby, President and head of state of the Republic of Chad, on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of its independence.
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop favorably, the message wished the president, the government and the people of Chad greater success in their work for stability and prosperity of the country.
